title: 210 - Apple: Unlocking A Tremendous Captive Market (Mark Hibben)
description: Apple stock is down and concerns are high for many investors. Mark and Brian discuss why the extreme negative market sentiment is way overdone and where investors can look to find an optimistic future.
content:encoded: Apple stock is down and concerns are high for many investors. Mark and Brian discuss why the extreme negative market sentiment is way overdone and where investors can look to find an optimistic future.
